20  from abc import ABCMeta 
21  from imusim.utilities.time_series import TimeSeries 
22  from imusim.behaviours.timing import TimerMultiplexer, VirtualTimer 
23  from imusim.behaviours.sampling import PeriodicSampler 
24  from imusim.algorithms.calibration import SensorCalibration

29 -class BasicIMUBehaviour(object): 

30      """ 
31      Basic behaviour for an IMU that performs periodic sampling. 
32   
33      @ivar imu: L{IMU} on which the behaviour executes. 
34      @ivar samplingPeriod: Interval at which to sample and process (float). 
35      @ivar calibration: Mapping from IMU L{Sensor}s to L{SensorCalibration}s 
36          (dict). 
37      @ivar filter: L{OrientationFilter} to update with each set of samples. 
38      @ivar sampleCallback: Function to call after each sample. The behaviour 
39          object will be passed as a single argument. 
40      @ivar timerMux: L{TimerMultiplexer} for IMU timer. 
41      """ 
42   
43      __metaclass__ = ABCMeta 
44   

45 -    def __init__(self, imu, samplingPeriod, calibration=None, filter=None, 
46              sampleCallback=None, initialTime=0): 

47          """ 
48          Initialise IMU behaviour. 
49   
50          @param imu: L{IMU} on which the behaviour executes. 
51          @param samplingPeriod: Interval at which to sample and process (float). 
52          @param calibration: Mapping from IMU L{Sensor}s to 
53              L{SensorCalibration}s (dict). 
54          @param filter: L{OrientationFilter} to update with each set of samples. 
55          @param sampleCallback: Function to call after each sample. The 
56              behaviour object will be passed as a single argument. 
57          @param initialTime: Initial time for local timekeeping. 
58          """ 
59   
60          self.imu = imu 
61          self.samplingPeriod = samplingPeriod 
62          self.calibration = calibration 
63          self.filter = filter 
64   
65          for sensor in imu.sensors: 
66              sensor.rawMeasurements = TimeSeries() 
67              if self.calibration is not None: 
68                  sensor.calibratedMeasurements = TimeSeries() 
69   
70          self.sampleCallback = sampleCallback 
71   
72          self.timerMux = TimerMultiplexer(imu.timer) 
73   
74          PeriodicSampler(imu.adc, imu.sensors, VirtualTimer(self.timerMux), 
75                  samplingPeriod, self._handleSample) 
76   
77          self._time = initialTime 

78   

79 -    def _handleSample(self, *measurements): 

80          measurements = list(measurements) 
81          self._time += self.samplingPeriod 
82          for sensor, measurement in zip(self.imu.sensors, measurements): 
83              sensor.rawMeasurements.add(self._time, measurement) 
84              if self.calibration is not None: 
85                  measurement = self.calibration[sensor].apply(measurement) 
86                  sensor.calibratedMeasurements.add(self._time, measurement) 
87          if self.filter is not None: 
88              self.filter(*measurements + [self._time]) 
89          if self.sampleCallback != None: 
90              self.sampleCallback(self)
